item.title: Beginner friendly Hand-on Project on AWS S3 â€” Part 1
item.description: I want to help beginner gain some confident on their journey in cloud and tech. I will be posting tutorials and lessons on cloud tech and security such that its more understandable and have not burden but fun and easy to comprehend. Letâ€™s start with a service provided by AWS, called Amazon S3. You ever heard about S3? No! Ever used Google Drive to store your files online? Yes! Itâ€™s a primary example of how object storage works.

item.title: What's IaC (Infrastructure as a Code)Â ???
item.description: What’s IaC (Infrastructure as a Code)Â ??? Introduction Have you ever setup a virtual machine? You might know about using an ISO file to load in Oracle Virtual Box, going through all the steps on by one to install the ISO on the Virtual Hard-Disk and that’s a lot of time being wasted. Well, to save some time you might have backed up you VM (of course Virtual Machine) and used OVA to load your VM.
